about.title: About me
about.description: Living in Florianópolis - SC, Brazil. Besides software development, my interests include listening to music, exercising, playing chess and reading a good book.

personal-interests.title: Personal Interests
personal-interests.description: I'm passionate about neuroscience, philosophy and 'self-help'. I love diving into books that expand my understanding of the human brain, existence and personal growth. Music is a big part of my life. Additionally, I'm a jiu-jitsu enthusiast. This year (2024), I'm celebrating my tenth year of training and at 17 years old, I'm already a purple belt. Jiu-jitsu has taught me discipline, resilience and strategic thinking. I've participated in approximately 40 championships.
